name: Zen Paint
description:
Goal

Zen Paint is a color-by-number game displayed on a hexagonal grid. The goal is to paint all of the uncolored hexagons in each level. Simply click on the uncolored hexagons to paint them. Correctly paint all the hexagons in a level to finish it!

Zen

Zen Paint is a great way to relax. Sit back and paint while you listen to peaceful bird sounds and soothing piano music. No time limits, no stress. Play at your own pace through 6 themed worlds, with 100 levels to paint!

View Styles, Settings, etc!

Change the view type at any time play in your favorite style! Change game fonts, shadows, toggle progress tracking, color switching, or turn off hints if you really want to! With a variety of settings you can Zen in any way you want!
